overview:
Brian McGuffie has been running the Glasgow graphic design company G3 Creative Solutions in Scotland since 2006. He has been working tirelessly on a broad mix of exciting projects. These include large long-term commissions, design and consultancy work for established businesses, public sector and start-up businesses alike.

Key Strengths: Attention to detail, superb work ethic, a keen eye for composition, typography, colour and design that always leads to producing stunning and effective visual results that exceeds clients expectations.

Excellent knowledge of the following design and layout applications - Adobe CS2 including Photoshop, Image Ready, Illustrator, Indesign and Acrobat. Guru in Macromedia Freehand, proficient in Quark XPress, Page Maker, Microsoft Word, and PowerPoint.

Achievements: Designing and implementing successful graphic design and advertising campaigns, generating leads in targeted markets. Developing and growing G3 Creative as a world-wide design brand.
